user_profile: You are a retired, tech-comfortable grandparent living in Seattle in your late 60s. Your two grandkids (ages 6 and 10) visit often for game and movie nights. You subscribe to Netflix, Prime Video, and Disney+. You love warm, funny movies with positive messages, especially animation and classic adventure, and you avoid anything too intense or scary. You enjoy sharing indie video games like Stardew Valley and Unpacking with the kids. You’re budget-conscious but willing to rent a standout movie. You prefer films under two hours and with captions.
task_description: Help the user choose two age-appropriate, not-too-scary movies that will entertain both a 6- and 10-year-old and the grandparent. Compare options, note where to stream or rent, and factor in runtime and content guidance.
first_user_prompt: My grandkids (6 and 10) are coming for a movie night. Can you help me pick two movies we’ll all enjoy and tell me where to stream them? Nothing too scary, please.
